Text.content:
The list element provides powerful features to collect and display collections of elements on a page. The "Dynamic List" formatter provides Ajax-based paging trough long lists. For sorting and filtering a dynamic list, two special formatters are available:

  • The "Sort / category filter" formatter allows to sort the list and filter by category.
  • The "Archive filter" formatter provides full text search in the list, filtering by date (year / month) and also filtering by category. 

In order to use these features, just drop the same list element on the page multiple times and select different "Dynamic List" formatters.
